{"step_by_step_thinking": "To assess long term glucose control, we need a measure that reflects the average blood sugar levels over a prolonged period. Estimation of urine sugar level is not a reliable indicator of glucose control as it can be affected by various factors. On the other hand, estimation of blood level of glycosylated hemoglobin (HbA1c) is a widely used test to assess long-term glucose control.
